mobiles.name: evil monk
mobiles.long_description: A robed monk snarls in hatred when he sees you!
mobiles.description:
The fanatic monks of the Unholy Abbey despise all other people, especially
intruders in their sanctum! And you can rest assured they will do their
utmost to eject you!

mobiles.name: clay golem
mobiles.long_description: A statue fashioned from clay stands motionless here.
mobiles.description:
This statue isn't very well-fashioned, and isn't very attractive. You wonder
why even the unholy monks would use such art in their abbey. Shrug.

mobiles.name: monk master
mobiles.long_description: A monk clad in black robes with silver edging sneers contemptously at you.
mobiles.description:
The master monks are the teachers and supervisors of the monks of the abbey,
and answer only to the abbot himself. They are if anything more diabolical
than their demented pupils, and twice as deadly.

mobiles.name: necromancer
mobiles.long_description: A frail old man clad in purple robes casts evil incantations here.
mobiles.description:
The abbey employs several necromancers to create their legions of undead,
with which they one day intend to conquer the kingdom of Malathar. They are
horrid, twisted, decrepit old men, who have incredible magical powers.

mobiles.name: abbot
mobiles.long_description: The unholy abbot screams vile curses at you and attacks!
mobiles.description:
The abbot is a vile, despicable old tyrant who rules his damned abbey with
an iron fist and a lust for conquest and death bordering on the maniacal.
He may be a shrivelled old man, but he is still immensely powerful.

mobiles.name: wight
mobiles.long_description: A leering wight leaps to attack you.
mobiles.description:
The necromancers of the abbey have animated the remains of Knights of
Malathar slain by the monks and transformed them into horrid wights, and
additionally infusing them with a manic desire to slay everyone they behold.

mobiles.name: bone devil
mobiles.long_description: A devil that seems to be naught but bones and gristle leers at you.
mobiles.description:
The monks frequently summon devils to aid them in their evil schemes, and
their favorite is the bone devil, who only demands seven virgins rather than
the many scores other devils demand.

mobiles.name: elven virgin
mobiles.long_description: A scraming, naked young elven maiden is chained to the altar.
mobiles.description:
The monks capture and sacrifice female elven virgins to summon devils from
the Hells. This one has gone quite insane from the pain and shock of capture
and subsequent subjection to the cruel rituals of the monks.

mobiles.name: dwarven dwarf slave
mobiles.long_description: A dwarf pounds away at a pile of rocks here.
mobiles.description:
The monks may be powerful warriors but they are no engineers, so they capture
dwarves from the north and use them in this capacity, to expand and strengthen
their abbey.

mobiles.name: ogre slavemaster master
mobiles.long_description: A huge, scarred ogre cracks his whip at you and orders to to surrender.
mobiles.description:
This overconfident brute is one of many employed by the monks to keep their
slaves in line. He rashly expects you to just lie down and die for him. Hmmm.

mobiles.name: paladin
mobiles.long_description: A paladin shakes his head and struggles to regain consciousness.
mobiles.description:
This hapless fellow was captured by the old Dragon Clan many centuries ago
and imprisoned here. The new clan has not dared to disturb him, for they
know of his power.

mobiles.name: black dragon
mobiles.long_description: (Sleeping) A massive black dragon is curled up on the floor here.
mobiles.description: They aren't called the dragon clan for nothing, pal.

mobiles.name: old elf
mobiles.long_description: An old elf sits upon the rock here.
mobiles.description:
This old elf, one Felthesres by name, is one of the bards of Malathar who has
vowed to remain here and await the return of the Paladin Grimafax from his
missions. He has been waiting several centuries, and will be waiting for
much longer before Grimafax returns.

mobiles.name: bone golem
mobiles.long_description: A bone golem tirelessly works the bellows here.
mobiles.description:
This creature was created to keep the dragon noises continually echoing
from the cavern entrance. It will not attack, but it will move to defend
itself.

mobiles.name: wyvern
mobiles.long_description: A massive wyvern is hovering just above you.
mobiles.description:
This wyvern is a scout for the monks of the abbey, you surmise. Then again
it could be a perfectly normal wyvern that just happens to be wearing a
massive green amulet with "dragon clan" written on it...

mobiles.name: pit beast
mobiles.long_description: A pit beast lunges at you!
mobiles.description:
These savage mutant hounds are horrors feared the world over. Only the monks
have managed to tame these beasts, much to the displeasure of civilized
folk everywhere.

objects.name: monk habit
objects.description: A long brown monk's robe stained with blood lies crumpled on the floor.

objects.name: master robe habit
objects.description: A black monk's robe trimmed with silver lies here.

objects.name: necromancer robes
objects.description: Some purple robes lie here.

objects.name: dagger
objects.description: A dagger made from mithril lies here. It looks evil.

objects.name: altar
objects.description: A large marble bloodstained altar rests in the center of the chapel.

objects.name: abbot ring
objects.description: A black ring that glows with an unholy light lies here.

objects.name: abbot robes
objects.description: Some crimson robes lie here.

objects.name: bracers might
objects.description: A pair of sturdy metal bracers lie here, unclaimed.

objects.name: sword elven
objects.description: An ornately-fashioned sword lies here.

objects.name: suit elven chainmail
objects.description: A suit of well-crafted chain lies here.

objects.name: shield
objects.description: A shield covered with mithril runes is propped up against a wall here.

objects.name: tattered cloak
objects.description: A tattered old cloak lies here.

objects.name: scythe
objects.description: A scythe lies here, glowing.

objects.name: manacles
objects.description: A pair of iron manacles lies here.

objects.name: pick
objects.description: A pick is lying here.

objects.name: whip
objects.description: A whip is curled up on the floor here.

objects.name: iron key
objects.description: An iron key is lying here.

objects.name: silver key
objects.description: A sliver key is lying here.

objects.name: gold key
objects.description: A gold key is lying here.

objects.name: chest key
objects.description: A chest key is lying here.

objects.name: chest
objects.description: An iron chest sits here.

objects.name: suit unholy armor
objects.description: A suit of unholy armor lies here.

objects.name: sack
objects.description: A sack lies here.

objects.name: gold
objects.description: Some gold has been scattered here. Quite a lot actually.

objects.name: bellows
objects.description: A bellows sits here.

objects.name: green amulet
objects.description: A bright green amulet is lying here.

extra_descriptions.description: It has "DRAGON CLAN" scribed upon it.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A green portal floats here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A green portal floats here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A red portal floats here.

objects.name: sack
objects.description: A sack lies on the floor here.

objects.name: lantern
objects.description: A lantern in excellent condition sits here.

objects.name: chest
objects.description: A small chest sits here.

objects.name: wineskin
objects.description: A wineskin hangs from a hook on one wall.

objects.name: waterskin
objects.description: A waterskin hangs from a hook on one wall.

objects.name: iron rations
objects.description: Some unopened iron rations sit here.

objects.name: backpack
objects.description: A backpack sits here.

objects.name: hand axe
objects.description: A hand axe hangs by a thong from a hook on one wall.

objects.name: throwing axe
objects.description: A throwing axe hangs by a thong from a hook on one wall.

objects.name: bo stick
objects.description: A bo stick rests against one wall here.

objects.name: jo stick
objects.description: A bo stick rests against one wall here.

objects.name: quarterstaff
objects.description: A quarterstaff is lying on the floor here.

objects.name: crossbow
objects.description: A crossbow is resting against one wall here.

objects.name: quiver
objects.description: A large quiver is hanging from a hook opposite the door.

objects.name: shield
objects.description: A white shield bearing a white hart on a green field lies here.

objects.name: surcoat
objects.description: A surcoat bearing the coat of arms of Malathar lies here.

objects.name: throne
objects.description: A throne sits here.

extra_descriptions.description: You think you can see a secret door beneath it...

objects.name: skeleton
objects.description: A skeleton is seated upon the throne.

extra_descriptions.description: This skeleton appears to be humanoid...

objects.name: sarcophagus
objects.description: A masive sarcophagus rests here.

objects.name: red amulet
objects.description: A glowing red amulet lies here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A red portal floats here.

objects.name: desk
objects.description: A small desk sits in front of the shelves.

objects.name: letter
objects.description: An unfinished letter lies on the desk.

extra_descriptions.description:
The letter reads-

"We must make our move soon! Already the elves of Malathar have become aware
of our presence, and are seeking to stop us! Oh but when we call upon the
power of the DRAGON, how they will suffer! If only the Demon Lord could offer
us more -"

objects.name: book
objects.description: A particularly large book detailing ritual sacrifice sits here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A blue portal floats here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A blue portal floats here.

objects.name: portal
objects.description: A black portal floats here.

objects.name: bath
objects.description: A bath is slowly filling with natural spring water here.

objects.name: blue amulet
objects.description: A blue amulet glows with an unearthly light here.

rooms.name: The Path to the Craggy Tor
rooms.description:
You are ascending steadily upwards through rough terrain towards a large,
jagged mountain far to the north. There is a small rock resting here, near
the path, which could serve as a passable chair. There is a sign nailed to
a dead tree that hangs over the rock.

rooms.name: The Path to the Craggy Tor
rooms.description:
You continue up the path, only vaguely noticing the bleak terrain around
you as the climb is quite exerting. Birds circle far overhead, taking only
a casual interest in you. The path bends sharply to the east at this point.

rooms.name: The Path to the Craggy Tor
rooms.description:
The path bends back to the north here, heading straight for the base of the
Tor. However, there appears to be a deep chasm dividing the path from the
base, and you wonder how you will pass it.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You reach the edge of the chasm, and stare across at the Tor. Sure enough,
you can see the abbey, nestled in a small crack that divides the top third
of the tor in two. It appears to have no doors or windows, and you can't
see any way across. You think you can see a black shape nestled atop the
abbey.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: Flying Above the Chasm
rooms.description:
You soar into the air and fly over the chasm, which yawns below you,
descending to a depth of about 200 feet. You can see a small ledge outside
the abbey to the north.

rooms.name: Flying Above the Chasm
rooms.description:
You soar into the air and fly over the chasm, which yawns below you,
descending to a depth of about 200 feet. You can see a small ledge outside
the abbey to the north. You hear what sounds like a dragon roaring far below.

rooms.name: Flying Above the Chasm
rooms.description:
You soar into the air and fly over the chasm, which yawns below you,
descending to a depth of about 200 feet. You can see a small ledge outside
the abbey to the north.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Chasm
rooms.description:
You are heading round the edge of the chasm. You can see no way across it
from here, though you could perhaps proceed across or down if you could
fly. You can still see the Tor, and the abbey at its summit. The black
shape is still hovering atop it.

rooms.name: The End of the Path
rooms.description:
The path ends here in a dead end at a high cliff face. You have no choice
but to turn back.

rooms.name: Outside the Abbey
rooms.description:
You are standing on a narrow ledge that runs along the south wall of the
abbey. You see no doors, windows or other places where you could enter or
exit. Baffled, you move on.

rooms.name: Outside the Abbey
rooms.description:
You are standing on a narrow ledge that runs along the south wall of the
abbey. You see no doors, windows or other places where you could enter or
exit. You can fly up to the roof from here if you wish, though.

rooms.name: Outside the Abbey
rooms.description:
You are standing on a narrow ledge that runs along the south wall of the
abbey. You see no doors, windows or other places where you could enter or
exit. Baffled, you move on.

rooms.name: The End of the Path
rooms.description:
The path ends here in a dead end at a high cliff face. You have no choice
but to turn back.

rooms.name: Flying up the Abbey Walls
rooms.description:
You are flying swiftly upwards, passing parallel to the sheer cliff-like
walls of the abbey. There appears to be no possible entrance to this place.
Nor is there any sign of life, save the massive black shape you spied earlier
perched atop the roof.

rooms.name: The Roof of the Abbey
rooms.description:
The roof is dominated by a huge pile of rocks and assorted rubble, which
serves as a perch for a rather large black dragon, the Clan's "mascot" for
want of a better word. Have fun.

rooms.name: The Bottom of the Chasm
rooms.description:
The floor of the chasm is littered with assorted debris that has accumulated
over several centuries as many dragon clans rose and fell in the abbey. You
hear a dread howling that echoes about you.

rooms.name: The Bottom of the Chasm
rooms.description:
The floor of the chasm is littered with assorted debris that has accumulated
over several centuries as many dragon clans rose and fell in the abbey. You
hear a dread howling that echoes about you. A cavern opens up in front of
you and bright red eyes glare sullenly at you from within!

rooms.name: The Bottom of the Chasm
rooms.description:
The floor of the chasm is littered with assorted debris that has accumulated
over several centuries as many dragon clans rose and fell in the abbey. You
hear a dread howling that echoes about you.

rooms.name: The Eyes Have It
rooms.description:
The "eyes" turn out to be red lamps hung from long chains attached to a
wooden crossbeam set in the ceiling of this cavern. The roaring can still
be heard, louder than ever. It appears to be emanating from the north.

rooms.name: The Bellows Golem
rooms.description:
You have found the source of the dread howling- a giant bellows, being slowly
worked by a bone golem. It seems a rather puerile protective measure,
considering most intelligent adventurers wouldn't be fooled. YOU weren't
fooled, were you?

A greenish glow is coming from the north.

rooms.name: The Portal Chamber
rooms.description:
You enter a large square room, 40'x40', with a glowing green portal in the
ceiling. However, a large grate is blocking entry to it. There is a bright
green padlock depending from the grate. Do you have a key?

rooms.name: The Portal
rooms.description: The portal is flowing right in front of you. You may enter it if you wish.

rooms.name: Level One
rooms.description:
You emerge from the portal into a square room identical to the one you just
left. Two portals lie here, one green, and one red. A passage runs away to
the east. A grate with a red lock blocks access upward to the red portal.

rooms.name: The Passage
rooms.description:
This passage has been recently swept clean, and shows no trace of passage.
Doors line it to either side, as well as at the eastern end. There is a
glowing portal to the west.

rooms.name: A Storage Room
rooms.description:
You have entered a small room containing all manner of supplies- ropes,
lanterns, tinderboxes, wineskins, waterskins, sacks, bags, chests and such.
You can search through the items if you wish, or return to the passage
outside.

rooms.name: A Storage Room
rooms.description:
You have entered a small room containing all manner of supplies- ropes,
lanterns, tinderboxes, wineskins, waterskins, sacks, bags, chests and such.
You can search through the items if you wish, or return to the passage
outside.

rooms.name: The Passage
rooms.description:
This passage has been recently swept clean, and shows no trace of passage.
Doors line it to either side, as well as at the eastern end. There is a
glowing portal to the west.

rooms.name: An Armory
rooms.description:
A small room lies beyond the door, filled with all sorts of weapons
commonly used by monks, especially militant fanatic ones. They are in good
condition, but appear to be perfectly ordinary.

rooms.name: An Armory
rooms.description:
A small room lies beyond the door, filled with all sorts of weapons
commonly used by monks, especially militant fanatic ones. They are in good
condition, but appear to be perfectly ordinary.

rooms.name: A Strange Room
rooms.description:
You enter a small, dimly-lit room, containing naught but a throne, upon
which is seated a skeleton. There appears to be nothing else of interest
in the chamber.

rooms.name: A Tunnel
rooms.description:
You enter a tunnel which is lined with foot- and hand-holds on one wall,
allowing you to descend. The air is damp and chill, and you shiver.

rooms.name: The Bottom of the Tunnel
rooms.description:
You reach the bottom and shiver again as a blast of cold air hits you. There
is nothing in this cramped space save a massive door to the east covered in
mystic runes.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes read- "RELEASE NOT THE SPIRIT THAT SHALL SLAY US ALL"

rooms.name: The Tomb
rooms.description:
The tomb is icy cold, almost dangerously so, and is dominated by a huge
sarcophagus, inside which rests the corpse of an elven paladin. Maybe it
wasn't such a good idea releasing him...

rooms.name: The Portal
rooms.description: The red portal floats in front of you. Enter it to continue...

rooms.name: The Portal Chamber
rooms.description:
You emerge into yet another 40'x40' chamber, this one containing a red
portal and a blue portal behind a grate with a blue lock. Doors lead out
of this chamber in all directions.

rooms.name: A Long Dark Passage
rooms.description:
This corridor is pitch-black- even with your light you can scarcely see a
thing! You think you can feel a door to the north.

rooms.name: A Long Dark Passage
rooms.description:
This corridor is pitch-black- even with your light you can scarcely see a
thing! You think you can feel a door to the east.

rooms.name: A Long Dark Passage
rooms.description:
This corridor is pitch-black- even with your light you can scarcely see a
thing! You think you can feel a door to the west.

rooms.name: A Long Dark Passage
rooms.description:
This corridor is pitch-black- even with your light you can scarcely see a
thing! You think you can feel a door to the south.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description:
You emerge into a room that appears to be some sort of barracks. Normally
several monks can be found here, practicing their katas and meidtating.
Perhaps you'll be lucky and find none...

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description:
You emerge into a room that appears to be some sort of barracks. Normally
several monks can be found here, practicing their katas and meidtating.
Perhaps you'll be lucky and find none...

rooms.name: A Chamber
rooms.description:
this appears to be some sort of relaxation chamber- it would seem even
diabolically evil fanatic megalomanical demon-worshipping monks need to
relax every now and again. However, in true monk style, the room is devoid
of funriture- only a few straw mats and some simple tapestries provide any
comfort.

rooms.name: A Study
rooms.description:
This is apparently the study of one of the master monks. Bookcases full of
texts detailing ritual sacrifice and such line the walls, and a small desk
sits in front of them, though it doesn't look as if it gets much use.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. Belatedly, you notice the floor doesn't feel quite
right here...

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. You feel a door to the east.

rooms.name: A Pit Trap
rooms.description:
You stumble into a pit. The fall isn't great, and you quickly leap back up,
wondering why the monks would make such a harmless trap. Then you notice
the stench and hear the growling...

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door lies to the east.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the south.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the north.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the east.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the west.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the south.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the north.

rooms.name: A Study
rooms.description:
This is apparently the study of one of the master monks. Bookcases full of
texts detailing ritual sacrifice and such line the walls, and a small desk
sits in front of them, though it doesn't look as if it gets much use.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be felt to the west.

rooms.name: A Study
rooms.description:
This is apparently the study of one of the master monks. Bookcases full of
texts detailing ritual sacrifice and such line the walls, and a small desk
sits in front of them, though it doesn't look as if it gets much use.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. There is a door to the north.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. You take another step, and realize there is a pit
beneath your feet...

rooms.name: An Acid Pit
rooms.description:
This pit isn't particularly deep, and you hit the bottom wondering what's
next. Then you start to feel a mild stinging sensation, followed by a clinking
sound as your coins start to fall from your money pouch, which is being
eaten away by acid!

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door lies to the south.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door lies to the west.

rooms.name: A Study
rooms.description:
This is apparently the study of one of the master monks. Bookcases full of
texts detailing ritual sacrifice and such line the walls, and a small desk
sits in front of them, though it doesn't look as if it gets much use.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door lies to the east.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. A door can be vaguely made out to the north.

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. Suddenly your feet cease to find floor beneath them...

rooms.name: A Fire Pit
rooms.description:
You fall into what appears to be a giant BBQ. You cringe and leap in the
air as your feet encounter burning piles of coal and other materials. It is
HOT in here!

rooms.name: A Long Black Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor is dark, almost supernaturally so, and you make your way along
slowly and carefully. You see a door to the south.

rooms.name: The Necromancers' Labs
rooms.description:
You walk into a dank, smelly chamber full of tables stacked with body parts.
Feeble illumination comes from a weak light spell cast on some rods of
mithril; besides that the room is almost completely dark. Doors lead east,
west and north.

rooms.name: The Cells
rooms.description:
Here the Necromancers store the results of their twisted experiments on some
captured elven knights. They howl and scream so much that even their
creators are scared of them.

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
This dismal chamber contains little but a few rags and scraps of flesh and
bone. Whatever lives here certainly has bad domestic habits.

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
This dismal chamber contains little but a few rags and scraps of flesh and
bone. Whatever lives here certainly has bad domestic habits.

rooms.name: The Blue Portal
rooms.description:
This portal leads to the highest tier of the abbey. Be careful- there's no
turning back now!

rooms.name: The Final Portal Chamber
rooms.description:
This 40'x40' room has the usual two portals, save that here there is no
lock on the one set in the roof. In fact you can walk right into it from
here should you so desire. Hmmm...

Arched hallways run east, south and north, while a door bars passage westward.

rooms.name: The Arched Corridor
rooms.description:
you slowly walk along the passage. An eerie feeling comes over you, and you
shiver. Distant chanting can be heard, as well as the occasional tolling
of a large bell. You hear more chanting, then a terrible scream. Oh dear...

rooms.name: The West Wing of the Unholy Chapel
rooms.description:
You are standing in the west wing, among pews stained with blood and other
fluids, most of them unidentifiable. A great cry goes up to the east. You
peer in that direction and- OH MY GOD!

rooms.name: The Unholy Chapel
rooms.description:
It is here that the monks perform their unholy rites, summoning unnameable
horrors from the deepest pits of hell. You see sick murals covering the
walls, depicting the sacrifice of youths of all races to perverted, twisted
demons and devils.

rooms.name: The Altar
rooms.description:
You have reached the core of the evil, and the wicked heart that pulses the
energy through it. Though you have battled scores of opponents, rarely have
you previously encountered such evil. Foul ichor spews from gashes in the
walls of this place, coalescing into a floating portal to some netherworld
you know naught of. But you soon will, for it is there that you must next
travel, to rid the world of this evil!

rooms.name: The Inner Sanctum
rooms.description:
You have entered the quarters of the Abbot, master of the unholy abbey and
the foe you have dreaded facing the most. You can stop here to prepare for
the upcoming battle if you desire.

rooms.name: The Quarters of the Abbot
rooms.description:
These rooms, as you expected, are lavishly appointed with rich tapestries
and fine furniture from all over the world. You didn't think the abbot would
live so simply as his followers! You see a bathroom to the east, a study
to the south and a massive bedchamber to the north.

rooms.name: A Bedchamber
rooms.description:
This room is dominated by a great pile of rugs and cushions in the center
of the room, upon which the abbot reclines with whatever servant has taken
his fancy. At present it appears to be deserted...

rooms.name: A Study
rooms.description:
This study is more of a library, filled as it is with scores of grimoires
detailing the most despicable acts imaginable. A small desk, not dissimilar
to those you saw the maste rmonks using below, stands in the center of the
room, near a fireplace which burns magically without requiring fuel.

rooms.name: A Bathroom
rooms.description:
This chamber contains a large bath, which fills with natural spring water
from some hidden source. It appears to be palatable, surprising in this
foul place.

rooms.name: Under Construction
rooms.description:
This section of the abbey is being massively refurbished, for purposes
unknown to you. Sounds of construction echo all around you, and you proceed
with a fair deal of caution, not knowing of what mein the laborers may be.

rooms.name: Under Construction
rooms.description:
This section of the abbey is being massively refurbished, for purposes
unknown to you. Sounds of construction echo all around you, and you proceed
with a fair deal of caution, not knowing of what mein the laborers may be.

rooms.name: Under Construction
rooms.description:
This section of the abbey is being massively refurbished, for purposes
unknown to you. Sounds of construction echo all around you, and you proceed
with a fair deal of caution, not knowing of what mein the laborers may be.

rooms.name: Under Construction
rooms.description:
This section of the abbey is being massively refurbished, for purposes
unknown to you. Sounds of construction echo all around you, and you proceed
with a fair deal of caution, not knowing of what mein the laborers may be.

rooms.name: Under Construction
rooms.description:
This section of the abbey is being massively refurbished, for purposes
unknown to you. Sounds of construction echo all around you, and you proceed
with a fair deal of caution, not knowing of what mein the laborers may be.

rooms.name: An Empty Chamber
rooms.description:
You open the door and step into an apparently empty chamber. Neither rug
nor tapestry can be seen, nor chair nor table. There is no other exit besides
the one you entered. Strange...
